questions: What does Scripture teach about faith in hard times?
Where do you see faith in hard times at work or missing in your life?
How can you apply these verses intentionally this week?
reflection: Reflect on how the theme of faith in hard times shapes your character, spiritual walk, and daily decisions.
prayer: Lord, teach me to walk in the truth of faith in hard times. Strengthen me, guide my heart, and help me grow in this area. Amen.

prayer: Lord, teach me to walk in the truth of spiritual identity. Strengthen me, guide my heart, and help me grow in this area. Amen.
